alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 2:57PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern St. Johns County through 330 PM EDT... At 256 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Saint Augustine South, or 7 miles southwest of Saint Augustine, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Saint Augustine Beach, Saint Augustine Shores, Butler Beach, Vilano Beach, Saint Augustine South, Crescent Beach, Anastasia, Dupont Center and Elkton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Jacksonville.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns
